Package net.zethmayr.benjamin.spring.common.cli

A command parser.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandBinding
    Functional interface for command bindings.
    CommandTracker
    Implementations can receive start and finish notifications for commands
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Command
    A parsed command.
    CommandParser
    Parses hierarchically nested commands.
    SingleThreadCommandTracker
    A default implementation of command tracking, taking time as the metric.
    SubCommandBinding
    A CommandBinding that parses its arguments with its own CommandParser and runs any commands encountered.

Package net.zethmayr.benjamin.spring.common.cli Description

A command parser.
